testimonials.name: Bishnu Prasad Koirala
testimonials.text: Yukti ko smart products le mero ghar completely transform garyo. Quality excellent cha ani price ni reasonable. Highly recommended!

testimonials.name: Sita Kumari Thapa
testimonials.text: Installation dekhi customer service samma sabai ramro. Mero LED strip 6 months dekhi perfectly working cha.

testimonials.name: Ramesh Shrestha
testimonials.text: Security camera ko quality outstanding cha. Night vision clear cha ani app user-friendly cha. Paisa vasool!
